definition: "to eat" or "food" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 184)
a kind of rice-flour noodles from Yunnan province

sentences.english: You're bait won't float that great when using fluorocarbon as your leader.
sentences.chinese: 用氟碳线的时候你的饵不会浮的那么好。

sentences.english: The fish will soon be caught that nibbles at every bait.
sentences.chinese: 见饵就咬的鱼，很快就会上钩。

sentences.english: I should have waited for the fish to snap at the bait for some time and then I could catch it.
sentences.chinese: 我应该等待鱼咬饵一段时间，然后我可以抓住它。

sentences.english: I use baits with rattles for this also.
One of the more overlooked presentations with drop shots is "walking" it along the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 经常被忽略的一种倒钓呈现手法是将饵一路拖晃回来。

sentences.english: Most drift live bait, which is a much easier way to catch fish.
sentences.chinese: 他们很多都用活饵，这样上鱼要容易得多。

sentences.english: I realize lighter sinkers give the lure a more natural reaction.
sentences.chinese: 我也知道轻一点的铅可以给饵自然得多的姿态。

sentences.english: Thy baited hooks shall tangle me no more.
sentences.chinese: 你上饵的钩子不再能把我缠绞。

sentences.english: The traitor in strait straight forwardly told me the traits of the bait.
sentences.chinese: 海峡里的卖国贼直接主动地告诉了我饵的特性。

sentences.english: I think we need to buy some baits and borrow some fish poles first.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们需要先买一些饵，然后借一些钓竿。

sentences.english: Bait the hook. See if he bites.
Objective To observe the efficacy of gel bait against cockroches in dormitory.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察晔康杀蟑胶饵对职工宿舍蟑螂的杀灭效果。

sentences.english: "Alice," Carlisle asked, "will they take the bait?"
sentences.chinese: “爱丽丝，”卡莱尔问道，“他们会咬饵吗？”

sentences.english: The beauty of drop shotting is that it presents your bait naturally.
sentences.chinese: 倒钓的美妙之处在于，它能很自然的呈现你的饵。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the efficacy of 2% acetaniprid gel bait against Blattella germanica.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察2%啶虫脒杀蟑胶饵对德国小蠊的杀灭效果。

sentences.english: Most modern casting reels come in left-handed and right-handed configurations.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的抛饵轮都有左手轮和右手轮的不同构造。

definition: to fish with a hook and bait
variant of 魚鉤|鱼钩[yu2 gou1]
